$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|Come, Empress Sanaki. The Holy
Guard will protect you even if it
costs our lives.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|You've got it all wrong! You and
I are in competition here. And you
needn't hold back.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|Unable to stand still, as usual,
I see... And you tell me to play
to win? Hm.$k$p
